tax relief.translation[0].definitions[0]: when you do not have to pay tax on part of what you earn, especially because you use the money for a particular purpose
You can get tax relief on private health insurance premiums.
tax relief.translation[1].definitions[0]: the right not to have to pay tax on part of a sum of money that is earned or received. Sometimes the tax is paid first, and then given back by the authorities
The bill would give tax relief to middle-income individuals.
Borrowers canclaim tax relief on their pension contributions.
